song_lyric:
作曲 : 王梓鑫
 作词 : 天府事变
Mixed by mAjorHon

前辈呀 前辈呀
为何到现在还那么废
快过来跪下来掌个嘴
倚老卖老到底谁不会
前辈呀 前辈呀
太监这辈子别想上位
宫都被宫了你吧啦个**
没商量你十年都白做了喂
They said they ruling the game
But pardon how mucha they get?
Pioneers and pioneers
Your mothers don't want you to live
So I piss on your graves and I f**K up your plan
Don't wanna show you how big is my D**K
Swallow and swallow and eh
Old sh*t they scary and running away
As I lacerating my scar
glory just comes up around me
Salt ain't make it worse.It works
And I climbed upon this mountain valley
'Vincent Van Gogh' evaluate the vague pictures
as the fake rappers feel like they pioneers
They did have a lota SH*T for dinner
Now praise sophisticated sewer workers
the main problem is some fake ass still trapping in a bad trip
Lamborghini back seat Bad trick
Been in a daydream writing your rap sh*t
Call yourself a millionaire
the best instead of sitting there
figure out that you still a puppy yet
Public said you a pioneer
what kind of pioneer you are
just a frog sitting in a box
前辈呀 前辈呀
为何到现在还那么废
快过来跪下来掌个嘴
倚老卖老到底谁不会
前辈呀 前辈呀
太监这辈子别想上位
宫都被宫了你吧啦个**
没商量你十年都白做了喂
They said they ruling the game
But pardon how mucha they get?
Pioneers and pioneers
Your mothers don't want you to live
So I piss on your graves and I f**k up your plan
Don't wanna show you how big is my D**K
Swallow and swallow and eh
Old SH*T they scary and running away
不 怕 过 气
我的存在就是争议
真 对 不 起
太出风头让你生气
愿你有天能够做大然后再把我给封杀
在那之前吧
在那之前把所有的嫉妒吞下
等一下公子 请务必留步算个卦
遇见我算你走运今生有幸
血光之灾我来给你化
这些胡话的傻瓜就像下水道的喇叭
上升越高它越红脸低吼
其实每一步行动他根本就看不懂
下秒他就废了硬以为自己是我对手
HUH？
